column16: 'desc': [u'<div class="item_left_column" id="description">\n        <h3 class="item_desc_title fk-uppercase">Petit Electric Bottle Steriliser - 4 Slots (White
column17:
Green) Price: Rs.2450

Sterilizing baby bottles is very essential to keep your little one free from the attack of harmful germs that settle in these bottles when not washed properly. Gone are the days when you have to wait for long hours to sterilize baby bottles. With improved technologies in place
column18: you could now sterilize bottles for your little one in a short span of time. One such smartly designed sterilizer is this Petit Electric Bottle Steriliser \u2013 4 slots
column19:
a must-have baby accessory for your little one to stay healthy.

\r\n

\r\n\tThis sterilizer is ideal for use for both boys and girls. In addition to this
column20: the sterilizer is ideal for babies from 0 months plus. The power that this efficient sterilizer consumes to operate ranges from 220 V to 50 Hz. Besides this
column21: the compatible accessories for use in this Petit Electric Bottle Steriliser \u2013 4 slots are accessories and bottles. This sterilizer also comprises of tongs
column22:
thereby enabling you to take out bottles and other accessories outside after the sterilization process without any hassle. The ergonomic handles add to the ease of use.\xa0

\r\n

\r\n\tThe Petit Electric Bottle Steriliser \u2013 4 slots also comes with baskets. Making the entire sterilization process simple and uncomplicated is the 8 minute sterilizing time with 200 ml of water that this sterilizer takes. This saves time
column23: thereby simplifying the process for you as a parent as well. With this safe to use Petit Electric Bottle Steriliser \u2013 4 slots
column24:
you could now avoid the risk of burns while in use. One of the most advantageous features of this sterilizer is its auto-off function that adds to the comfort and convenience. You could now opt for this simple to use yet effective sterilizer to offer nothing but the best for your baby.

\n
\n ']

column16:
'desc': [u'

Petit DECT Baby Monitor (Audio) Price: Rs.6500

Baby monitors keep a close watch on your little one
column17: keeping you ensured of your little one\u2019s safety even while you are not around. One such monitor
column18: designed with utmost care is this Petit DECT Baby Monitor. This baby monitor is designed exclusively for the use of both boys and girls. In addition to this
column19: the monitor lets you keep a constant watch on your newborn babies. The audio monitoring mode in this Petit DECT Baby Monitor <strong>works within a range of 300 m
column20:
alerting you even of the slightest noise your little one makes.

\r\n

\r\n\tFor convenient everyday usage
column21: this baby monitor is powered by battery or AC. These batteries are rechargeable and hence add to the ease of use. With an input of 230 V AC and output of 6 V DC
column22: this monitor does not consume much power while in use. Designed with a digital technology
column23:
this Petit DECT Baby Monitor is certainly a worthy buy.

\r\n

\r\n\tAdding to the convenience
column24: this monitor also comprises of a night light. With the portable receiver in this Petit DECT Baby Monitor
column25: you could now move around freely and still be able to talk to your child
column26:
ensuring your little one that you are around. This monitor also facilitates maximum privacy. Adding to the ease of use is the reply function installed in this baby monitor.

\r\n

\r\n\tThe vox system in this Petit DECT Baby Monitor automatically switches the transmitter to the standby mode while not in use. Measuring 70 x 130 x 50 mm in dimension
column27: this baby monitor is compact and lightweight to handle. This monitor also comprises of a belt clip. Letting you know immediately when your infant wakes up and keeping you free from tension about your baby\u2019s comfort
column28:
this Petit DECT Baby Monitor is a must-have baby accessory.

\n
\n ']

column19: with the measuring cup you can measure the exact quantity of liquid that you require. The sterilization time of this Bottle Warmer is just three minutes so you need not be impatient. This Bottle Warmer is safe enough as it comes with an optimal heating system. Additionally

the rotating knob in this Warmer makes usage easier. This Petit Bottle Warmer measures 150 x 190 x 140 mm in dimension.
